ygData.subject: RE: Re: Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d have to disagree with that statement too. My group is 30-35 and we definitely die. I see dead people from other parties my level regularly. My friend s
ygData.messageBody:
> >At 30+ you basically don't die ...
>
> Ah if only that were true =)
>
> i died twice yesterday =( it may have had something to do with the level 48
> paladin we were trying to kill hehe.

I'd have to disagree with that statement too. My group is 30-35 and we
definitely die. I see dead people from other parties my level regularly.

My friend's group is the highest level on Erollisi Marr (40-45) and they
definitely die.

The only difference I can see is that after 29, clerics can revive, so if
the cleric doesn't die (and there IS a cleric, often there is not) you can
get a free ride back to your corpse.

---
Jesse <j@...>
